options.name: Create
options.description: Create an order

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an order

options.name: Get
options.description: Get an order

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many orders

options.name: Update
options.description: Update an order

values.name: amount
values.description: The amount that's deducted from the order total

values.name: code
values.description: When the associated discount application is of type code

values.name: type

options.name: Fixed Amount
options.description: Applies amount as a unit of the store's currency

options.name: Percentage
options.description: Applies a discount of amount as a percentage of the order total

options.name: Shipping
options.description: Applies a free shipping discount on orders that have a shipping rate less than or equal to amount

values.description: When the associated discount application is of type code

options.name: email
options.description: The customer's email address

options.name: fulfillmentStatus
Fulfilled
options.description: Every line item in the order has been fulfilled

options.name: Null
options.description: None of the line items in the order have been fulfilled

options.name: Partial
options.description: At least one line item in the order has been fulfilled

options.name: Restocked
options.description: Every line item in the order has been restocked and the order canceled
The order's status in terms of fulfilled line items

options.name: inventoryBehaviour
Bypass
options.description: Do not claim inventory

options.name: Decrement Ignoring Policy
options.description: Ignore the product's inventory policy and claim inventory

options.name: Decrement Obeying Policy
options.description: Follow the product's inventory policy and claim inventory, if possible
The behaviour to use when updating inventory

options.name: locationId
options.description: The ID of the physical location where the order was processed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: note
options.description: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order

options.name: sendFulfillmentReceipt
options.description: Whether to send a shipping confirmation to the customer

options.name: sendReceipt
options.description: Whether to send an order confirmation to the customer

options.name: sourceName
options.description: Where the order originated. Can be set only during order creation, and is not writeable afterwards.

options.name: tags
options.description: Tags attached to the order, formatted as a string of comma-separated values

options.name: test
options.description: Whether this is a test order

values.name: productId
values.description: The ID of the product that the line item belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: variantId
values.description: The ID of the product variant

values.name: grams
values.description: The weight of the item in grams

values.name: quantity
values.description: The number of items that were purchased

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields the order will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: attributionAppId
options.description: Show orders attributed to a certain app, specified by the app ID. Set as current to show orders for the app currently consuming the API.

options.name: createdAtMin
options.description: Show orders created at or after date

options.name: createdAtMax
options.description: Show orders created at or before date

options.name: financialStatus
Any
options.description: Show orders of any financial status

options.name: Authorized
options.description: Show only authorized orders

options.name: Paid
options.description: Show only paid orders

options.name: Partially Paid
options.description: Show only partially paid orders

options.name: Partially Refunded
options.description: Show only partially refunded orders

options.name: Pending
options.description: Show only pending orders

options.name: Refunded
options.description: Show only refunded orders

options.name: Unpaid
options.description: Show authorized and partially paid orders

options.name: Voided
options.description: Show only voided orders
Filter orders by their financial status

options.name: fulfillmentStatus
Any
options.description: Show orders of any fulfillment status

options.name: Partial
options.description: Show partially shipped orders

options.name: Shipped
options.description: Show orders that have been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of fulfilled.

options.name: Unfulfilled
options.description: Returns orders with fulfillment_status of null or partial

options.name: Unshipped
options.description: Show orders that have not yet been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of null.
Filter orders by their fulfillment status

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields the orders will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.

options.name: ids
options.description: Retrieve only orders specified by a comma-separated list of order IDs

options.name: processedAtMax
options.description: Show orders imported at or before date

options.name: processedAtMin
options.description: Show orders imported at or after date

options.name: status
Any
options.description: Show orders of any status, including archived orders

options.name: Cancelled
options.description: Show only canceled orders

options.name: Closed
options.description: Show only closed orders

options.name: Open
options.description: Show only open orders
Filter orders by their status

options.name: sinceId
options.description: Show orders after the specified ID

options.name: updatedAtMax
options.description: Show orders last updated at or after date

options.name: updatedAtMin
options.description: Show orders last updated at or before date

options.name: email
options.description: The customer's email address

options.name: locationId
options.description: The ID of the physical location where the order was processed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: note
options.description: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order

options.name: sourceName
options.description: Where the order originated. Can be set only during order creation, and is not writeable afterwards.

options.name: tags
options.description: Tags attached to the order, formatted as a string of comma-separated values

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a product

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a product

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a product

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many products

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a product

options.name: body_html
options.description: A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting.

options.name: handle
options.description: A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title. Used by the Liquid templating language to refer to objects.

options.name: images
options.description: A list of product image objects, each one representing an image associated with the product

options.name: created_at
options.description: The date and time when the product image was created

options.name: id
options.description: A unique numeric identifier for the product image

options.name: position
options.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the "main" image for the product.

options.name: product_id
options.description: The ID of the product associated with the image

options.name: variant_ids
options.description: An array of variant IDs associated with the image

options.name: src
options.description:
Specifies the location of the product image. This parameter supports URL filters that you can use to retrieve modified copies of the image.

For example, add _small, to the filename to retrieve a scaled copy of the image at 100 x 100 px (for example, ipod-nano_small.png), or add _2048x2048 to retrieve a copy of the image constrained at 2048 x 2048 px resolution (for example, ipod-nano_2048x2048.png).

.

options.name: width
options.description: Width dimension of the image which is determined on upload

options.name: height
options.description: Height dimension of the image which is determined on upload

options.name: updated_at
options.description: The date and time when the product image was last modified

options.name: productOptions
options.description: The custom product property names like Size, Color, and Material. You can add up to 3 options of up to 255 characters each.

options.name: product_type
options.description: A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products

options.name: published_at
options.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was published. Can be set to null to unpublish the product from the Online Store channel.

options.name: Global
options.description: The product is published to both the Online Store channel and the Point of Sale channel

options.name: Web
options.description: The product is published to the Online Store channel but not published to the Point of Sale channel

options.name: tags
options.description: A string of comma-separated tags that are used for filtering and search. A product can have up to 250 tags. Each tag can have up to 255 characters.

options.name: template_suffix
options.description: The suffix of the Liquid template used for the product page. If this property is specified, then the product page uses a template called "product.suffix.liquid", where "suffix" is the value of this property. If this property is "" or null, then the product page uses the default template "product.liquid". (default: null)

options.name: vendor
options.description: The name of the product's vendor

options.name: body_html
options.description: A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting.

options.name: handle
options.description: A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title. Used by the Liquid templating language to refer to objects.

options.name: images
options.description: A list of product image objects, each one representing an image associated with the product

options.name: created_at
options.description: The date and time when the product image was created

options.name: id
options.description: A unique numeric identifier for the product image

options.name: position
options.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the "main" image for the product.

options.name: product_id
options.description: The ID of the product associated with the image

options.name: variant_ids
options.description: An array of variant IDs associated with the image

options.name: src
options.description:
Specifies the location of the product image. This parameter supports URL filters that you can use to retrieve modified copies of the image.

For example, add _small, to the filename to retrieve a scaled copy of the image at 100 x 100 px (for example, ipod-nano_small.png), or add _2048x2048 to retrieve a copy of the image constrained at 2048 x 2048 px resolution (for example, ipod-nano_2048x2048.png).

.

options.description: Height dimension of the image which is determined on upload

options.name: updated_at

options.name: product_type

options.name: Global

options.name: Web

options.name: tags
options.description: A string of comma-separated tags that are used for filtering and search. A product can have up to 250 tags. Each tag can have up to 255 characters.

options.name: title
options.description: The name of the product

options.name: vendor
options.description: The name of the product's vendor

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields the product will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: collection_id
options.description: Filter results by product collection ID

options.name: created_at_max
options.description: Show products created before date

options.name: created_at_min
options.description: Show products created after date

options.name: fields
options.description: Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names

options.name: handle
options.description: Filter results by product handle

options.name: ids
options.description: Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of product IDs

options.name: presentment_currencies
options.description: Return presentment prices in only certain currencies, specified by a comma-separated list of ISO 4217 currency codes

options.name: product_type
options.description: Filter results by product type

options.name: published_at_max
options.description: Show products published before date

options.name: published_at_min
options.description: Show products published after date

options.name: published_status
Any
options.description: Show all products

options.name: Published
options.description: Show only published products

options.name: Unpublished
options.description: Show only unpublished products
Return products by their published status

options.name: title
options.description: Filter results by product title

options.name: updated_at_max
options.description: Show products last updated before date

options.name: updated_at_min
options.description: Show products last updated after date

options.name: vendor
options.description: Filter results by product vendor
